review: The doctors were kind and approachable, taking the time to thoroughly explain my dental situation without pressuring me into unnecessary services for the sake of profit. Their demeanor was courteous, and they were upfront and transparent about my condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I got my tooth extraction procedure done at Crown Dental on 13th April 24 and my experience has been "Excellent "
Dr Suhanya Prasana Kumar's team is quite confident,  well-trained professional  & caring! They extracted my tooth very well with minimal pain &
discomfort  *** ******* **********  ***********  *****! 
I highly recommend  this team to any one looking  for dental procedure. 
God bless this team of excellent Drs!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Scaling / Polishing,Scalling,
review: My visit to Dentist for various ailments was anxious one. But Doctors were cordial and the professional way the problems handled gave me confidence to take up complete treatment. The handling of the treatment was very professional, very hygienic (reminding about Covid days), cordial and explained at every stage about the procedures. Another important matter is the way the messages and alerts and calls to remind about appointments helped me a lot. The treatment charges were very reasonable and very happy that I chose this clinic for my dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am V.KRISHNAN, 77 at Electronic City. I was searching for a good dental care for replacement of my dentures. I went to CROWN DENTAL CARE at KAMMASANDRA VILLAGE Road, off NEELADRI NAGAR Road, Bengalore. I was amazed at the courtesy, respect they showed. Three times, I was asked to come for measurements and I could feel the dedication and devotion in the job. It took some time for me to really understand, why they take so much time. Later I could feel the precision with which measurements are taken - even a small contour and edges are well identified and finally when the denture came and fitted, I found heavenly.  Its now over 2 months, and I feel absolutely comfortable with the fittings.   I have to place my appreciation the utmost dedication and care taken by Chief Dentist Dr.(Mrs.) SUHANYA PRASANNAKUMAR and Dr.GAYATHRI in every stage... My prarthanas that every patient coming to this CLINIC would agree and endorse my views.  My Blessings to all in the Clinic.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind gesture and giving such a good review
